name: Return of the Obra Dinn
description: Lost at sea 1803 ~ The good ship Obra Dinn.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or better Processor: 2 GHz Intel i5 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Discrete GPU Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Requires 720p or higher resolution and outputs 16:9 aspect only, letterboxed if necessary.
